doc.title: Ghost Wagon
doc.plot: A mysterious wagon from out of the Old West appears in the modern day to Doc Arden, who first dismisses it as a delusion as it rolls past his house. Yet the wagon and its riders have a message for Doc, who finally pursues this Ghost Wagon and the Old West couple who drives it - and finds himself in the middle of a story of cowboys, Indians, government agents and a vicious band of bootleggers who exploit the Native Americans' addictions. Taken on a ride to the past on the Ghost Wagon, Doc discovers a tale of love, hate, conflict and guts that delivers all the action of a solid Western film, with a healthy mix of comedy and romance to boot. Follow the Ghost Wagon back in time for an adventure, and try not to lose your hat.
